Articles.Content:
I am Groot.

Do participation ribbons count?

The user below me wonders, when in their infancy oranges are actually green, if they should still be referred to as oranges.

Comrade Wolfe, that's got to be something on your end. My signature appears fine to me, with the twitch badge next to the line of aircraft. Could it be your monitor size?

I just tested by changing whole-page zoom. It looks like you're fine for higher res monitors, but anything 720p or narrower (which means many laptop monitors) might have issues. This is with fully updated Firefox. You might try a couple of browsers at 768x1366 to see as this is common on many laptops.

TUBM will disregard this post and answer respond to the previous post because I never answered it...

The user below me wonders, when in their infancy oranges are actually green, if they should still be referred to as oranges.

Nope - this never occured to me.

The user below me has landed on the Mun using the LOR mode.
Nope, I have never landed on the Mun. TUBM has, though.

yes, i did, i also landed on minmus,eve and duna

(i didnt came back from duna, eve was unmanned)

TUBM has a base on ksp

Nope. Too much time spent making fighters.

TUBM is not bored out of their minds at the moment.

True.

The user below me does not like to watch twitch streams.

True...i get bored because i keep showing up in the middle and have no clue what's going on.

The user,below,me has someone they love.

Most,Like,ly.

The user below me has yet to be deluded by The Illusive Man.

I don't even.

The user below me is both a trekkie and a star wars fan.

True!

The user below me knows what STO stands for (at least the one i am talking about)

If it's what I think you mean.... yeah.

TUBM thinks Apple Music is useless and wants the old iOS music app back.

Nope, don't have any apple devices at all.

The user below me is a girl

..Nope. Ich bin nicht.

The user below me has uploaded a ship to the Spacecraft Exchange.

Edited August 20, 2015 by Columbia

No, nah, no, not at all.

TUBM does not like pop music.

..Eugh. Still prefer classicals by far.

The user below me has a Space Station in orbit.

Does a MOTHERSHIP OF DEATH AND PAIN CALLED "RAGNAROK" THE DESTROYER OF ENEMIES, THE SAVIOR OF KERBALS GIGANTIC THING WITH WEAPONS AND FIGHTERS AND WEIGHING 1000 TONNES count as space station? If yes, then yes.

TUBM also has a death mothership in orbit.

Why would I tell you if I did?

TUBM can think of something to say.

Does this count?

TUBM is TU above me

Nope, I'm the user 13 posts above you.

TUBM plays/wants Starmade.

I don't ever know what Starmade is....

The user below me is not even 20 years old.

neither true neither false, i m younger and older at the same time.

Tubm support starmade game mechanics and game system concept but himself don't enjoy much at all that kind of slighty too rough "minecraft" cubic alike art and artwork, aside the great concepts within.

Edited August 21, 2015 by WinkAllKerb''

Still don't know what Starmade is...

The user below me likes the color red.

Well...

The user below me likes the new Mk1 cockpit.
No, I like my fighter jet styled cockpit. TUBM has posted on this thread before.
